Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transit rides. 

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use dockless scooters, bikes, ride-sharing like Uber or Lyft, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Enter Moovit! Moovit provides riders with a one-stop-shop journey experience to help them get from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and real-time arrival information with ease so that you can plan your trip with confidence. Pay and validate your rides. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike, scooter or a combination of them. 

Moovit guides more than 930 million users in over 3400 cities throughout the world. Commuters will find updated bus and train times, transit maps, and, where available, real-time line arrivals. Moovit is your personal assistant for all your transit rides! 

► Real-time arrivals. View real-time arrival information, which is taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

► Digital payment. Purchase bus & train tickets and validate your digital pass with a tap (select cities).

summary.label:
Has it ever happened that you have to meet someone and the person can't explain where he/she is? This app will quickly find the location of another phone by sending a text message request. Most phones manufactured after 2010 can accept this request, no need to install any additional app on the 2nd person's phone. It does not get any easier than this!

How it is working:

• User A wants to know a User B location.

• User A enters the phone number of User B into the app.

• The app generates a unique URL, and the URL is sent to User B.

• If User B clicks on the link, user A will see the location of user B.

Limitations:

• This is not a spy app. User B must agree to share the location with you.

• If User B has a device without GPS (desktop computer, tablet), the determined location may have a large accuracy margin (up to 5 km).

• In rare situations, when user B is behind the corporate proxy, the app can show the proxy's location, not the user's.

The user location is determined in three ways:

• E.123, E.164
• RIR
• W3C Geolocation API

Huntloc is a real-time hunting, tracking and management app for hunting teams and provides tracking devices for hunting dogs. You can see the movement of hunting dogs and other hunters on your smartphone, share information between hunters and create your own hunting map.

Tracking a common hunt is easy
One of the members of the hunt starts hunting on his or her phone and receives a unique code. Other hunters join the hunt using this code. This creates a hunting team whose movement is visible on the phone map. When the owner of a hunting dog with a Huntloc tracking device joins the hunt, all participants will also be able to see the dog's location. 
Hunting with Huntloc is more effective, safer and more fun
•	While on a common hunt, your phone shows the current location of dogs and hunters, the direction of movement, the pace of movement, and the distance traveled. Hunting and dog tracking are unlimited in distance.
•	During the hunt, you can send messages to the participants and share the location of the various hunting events on the map (e.g., a caught game, an animal track, etc.). Plus, you can quickly call any hunter.
•	The different maps of Google and the Estonian Land Board and the hunting objects recorded by the hunter themselves (e.g., animal feeding places and other hunting-related locations and areas) give an accurate overview of the hunting ground. You can share your hunting objects with other Huntloc users. 
•	When navigating in the hunt, you can set a navigation target and then use the compass view to arrive at the desired location by the shortest route.
•	A 24-hour weather forecast with sunrise and sunset time will help you plan your hunt. You can view the weather forecast for your own location or for a location selected on the map.
•	Huntloc's portal.huntloc.com can be used for viewing the hunts you have participated in and for more convenient drawing of the hunting card.

The location of a dog with the Huntloc tracking device can be seen on your smartphone
The Huntloc tracking device provides a very accurate position of the dog in the terrain. The tracking device uses the mobile network and has no distance limitation - the dog can be tracked from thousands of kilometers away. All you need is a smartphone to monitor your dog and control your device. In addition to tracking, you can call the dog, listen to the dog's activities and give voice commands. Keeping the device constantly on the dog's neck, it acts as a security device and can be switched on from a distance when the dog is lost. 

The tracking device is very strong, lightweight, waterproof and has a long service life. The monitoring time is 36 hours (10 seconds interval) and the standby time is 1 month. In order to ensure waterproofing, there are no openings or buttons on the unit, and the 3 indicator lights indicate the unit's operating status. The device is charged wirelessly.

Simple and Easy App to determine various-format coordinates 

# User-friendly Design #
Your current location will automatically appear as the point of intersection of two grey lines, and can also be manually indicated via value-input, location search, and import from clipboard functions as well. 

# Support of Various Coordinate Formats #
Not only the app specifies Longitude / Latitude, but also supports a number of coordinate formats and systems, i.e., Universal Transverse Mercator Coordinate System (UTM), Military Grid Reference System (MGRS), World Geographic Reference System (Georef), etc. 

# Datum Conversion #
The app is able to transform coordinates within EPSG , ESRI, IAU2000 references from online database, and convert X & Y coordinates, geodetic datums and projected systems.

# Tracking and Navigation #
Pin your desired location on the map to start navigation. Real-time bearing/distance update and large coordinate readout for on-the-field usage are available. 

# World Magnetic Model Calculator #
The app utilizes World Magnetic Model WMM 2015 and/or WMM 2015v2, and is able to compute geomagnetic-field values: i.e., magnetic declinations, intensity, magnetic grid variation, etc. 

# Elevation / Altimeter #

Базовые карты-подложки от Google - схема, спутник и гибрид по умолчанию.

Инструмент рисования маршрутов прямо в приложении.
Установка меток и запись треков, их экспорт/импорт.
Навигация на метку с указанием направления и расстояния - вы всегда выйдите туда, куда нужно в дикой природе.
Организация ваших меток и треков в папки на устройстве и сохранение в облаке при запуске синхронизации - ничего не будет потеряно.

Функции платной подписки с картами охотугодий:
Управление видимостью слоев карты охотугодий.

Контакты и адреса охотничьих хозяйств.

Звуковое и текстовое Push-уведомление при пересечении границ охотугодий - вы вовремя сориентируетесь и не нарушите правила охоты.

De ANWB Onderweg app is alles-in-één app voor je autorit. De app heeft alles wat je onderweg nodig hebt: navigeren met informatie over files, flitsers en werkzaamheden, goedkoop parkeren, actuele benzineprijzen en beschikbaarheid van laadpalen.

De functionaliteiten in deze app:

• Betrouwbare navigatie 
Plan een route en bekijk voor je in de onderweg gaat waar je kunt tanken, laden of parkeren op jouw route of bestemming. Bekijk waar je het best en goedkoop kunt parkeren en stel deze parkeerplaats direct in als eindbestemming. Wil je onderweg tanken? De app toont alle tankstations inclusief prijzen op of langs jouw route. Voeg eenvoudig het tankstation naar keuze toe aan de route. De appt geeft aan hoeveel extra reistijd er eventueel is. Als je elektrisch rijdt, filter je op laadpalen. De app toont alle laadpalen op jouw route of eindbestemming. Met één klik voeg je een laadpaal toe aan de route. Zoals je van de ANWB gewend bent, krijg je alle actuele files en verkeersinformatie. Ook als je niet de navigatie aan hebt staan. Met de rijmodus functie ontvang je nog steeds alle info en nieuws.

• Actuele verkeersinformatie en filemeldingen 
In de app vind je een overzicht van actuele en betrouwbare ANWB verkeersinformatie in de buurt of op je route, zoals files (alle wegen), flitsers (snelwegen) en wegwerkzaamheden. Met de handige verkeersinformatielijst kun je per wegnummer alle files en incidenten bekijken.

• Goedkoper of gratis mobiel parkeren 
De app toont alle parkeerlocaties met tarieven in heel Nederland. In een handig overzicht zie je waar je op loopafstand van je bestemming goedkoper of gratis kunt parkeren. Heb je een parkeerplaats gekozen, dan stel je deze met één klik in als eindbestemming. De navigatie plant je route naar deze parkeerplaats. Parkeren in een parkeergarage? Dat kan ook met de app. Bekijk de openingstijden en maak een reservering om van je parkeerplek verzekerd te zijn. Op bestemming aangekomen betaal je gemakkelijk via de app. Je start en stopt de transactie wanneer jij wil. Zo betaal je alleen voor de tijd die je hebt geparkeerd. We sturen je gratis parkeermeldingen zodat je nooit een lopende transactie vergeet. ANWB Parkeren is een samenwerking met Yellowbrick en werkt in heel Nederland. Log in met je ANWB Parkeren account, voer de zonecode in, controleer je kenteken en start de transactie. Meld je gratis aan en parkeer al vanaf 0,15 cent per transactie. https://www.anwb.nl/mobielparkeren

Die Zeit vergeht, und die Landschaften ändern sich, es ist sehr schwierig, auf einem riesigen Feld ein uraltes Geisterdorf zu finden. Das schafft erhebliche Hindernisse für Lokalhistoriker und Liebhaber der Antike. Vetus Maps löst dieses Problem! Jetzt alle notwendigen Alte-Karten der Landkreise und Provinzen in Ihrem Smartphone. Die Anwendung ermöglicht es Ihnen, die alte Karte auf die entsprechnede moderne Karte zu übertragen.

Anwendungsmerkmale:

- Übertragung auf eine moderne Karte (Satellit, Hybrid, Gelände)
- Änderung der Transparenz der Karte
- Kartenkatalog zum Herunterladen
- Markierungen setzen
- GPS-Tracks aufzeichnen
- Suche nach Orten

Auf den alten Karten ist eine große Anzahl verschiedener Objekte angegeben, die man als wertvolle Datenquelle für die Toponymie verwenden kann, da viele Namen verloren gegangen sind - sie sind auf keiner topographischen topografischen Karte zu finden. Selbst in unserer heutigen Zeit, viele Jahre später, kann man mit Hilfe dieser Karten recht sicher durch die Landschaft navigieren.

Alte Karten sind immer offline verfügbar, für Satellitenkarten ist eine Internetverbindung erforderlich. Die Markerinstallation erfolgt durch langes Drücken auf die Karte

Map routes with your finger and Footpath will snap to roads and trails. Measure distances and elevations in seconds, then navigate along with turn-by-turn directions.

Footpath is the ultimate companion for planning and navigating custom routes. 

Join millions of adventurers and plan out your perfect route. 


SNAP TO MAP
Quickly measure distances by tracing a map with your finger or Apple Pencil. Footpath will snap to roads and trails on the map.

MEASURE DISTANCE AND ELEVATION
Know exactly how far and how high you'll travel with elevation profiles. Plan routes that match your goals.

SAVE ROUTES FOR LATER
Plan out your week or trip. Keep up to 5 routes on hand for reference, or save unlimited routes with Footpath Elite.

SHARE ROUTES
Send your routes to friends or workout partners to open on their device.


Footpath is designed to work for pretty much any activity or adventure, in any country:
• Running
• Cycling and mountain biking
• Hiking and mountaineering
• Walking
• Motorcycling and driving
• Backcountry skiing
• Kayaking and standup paddleboarding
• Sailing
• And many more!


FOOTPATH ELITE
Ready to go the extra mile? Upgrading to Footpath Elite unlocks the following powerful features:


TURN-BY-TURN NAVIGATION
- Footpath will tell you when to turn with turn-by-turn audio cues on your iPhone and Apple Watch.
- Save your route and cues in advance for voice guidance that works completely offline.
- Double tap your AirPods or use the playback controls button on your headphones to replay your next cue. 

PREMIUM MAPS
- 3D and topographic maps including Footpath Outdoors (Worldwide), USGS Topo Maps (U.S. and Canada), OpenCycleMap (Worldwide), and many more. 
- Cycling lanes, avalanche slope shading, and elevation contour lines.
- Save places as favorites to customize your maps

ORGANIZE
- Create and edit unlimited saved routes
- Duplicate, merge, and split routes
- Organize and sort routes into custom lists

ANALYZE
- Calendar log and weekly summary of your activity
- Analyze splits, speed, elevation, and heartrate
- Speed heatmaps

EXPORT
- GPX import and export
- TCX and FIT course export for turn-by-turn navigation on Garmin and Wahoo GPS devices
- Export cue sheets to a spreadsheet app for customization and printing
- Export routes and workouts to Apple Health


You can purchase a Footpath Elite monthly or yearly subscription through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Auto-renew can be turned off anytime by going to the Manage Subscriptions page in settings after purchase, and your features will remain active until the end of the subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the same cost as your original purchase.


TIPS FOR MAPPING ROUTES
• For longer routes, try zooming in and mapping your route in multiple segments.
• Tap and hold the map to quickly route between waypoints and POIs.
• Did Footpath snap to the wrong roads? Trace over the incorrect segment to edit, or use the eraser tool.
• Turn off snap to roads (magnet icon) and zoom in to manually trace the map. (Try switching to a satellite layer).
• Displaying maps and continuously running GPS in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. Navigate without maps or with the screen off for all day battery life.


CONTACT US
We've got a lot planned for Footpath. If you have any suggestions or feedback, or if you run into any issues, please contact us at support@footpathapp.com
